summary: Test flake in test_queue where first workflow can complete before the second starts, causing assertion failures on workflow IDs. Issue appears resolved after Core upgrade but may recur.
userImpact: Causes intermittent CI test failures that block development workflows.
rootCause: Sticky worker unavailability causing race condition where first workflow completes before second workflow starts, leading to unexpected workflow ID reuse.
proposedFix: Add failed-only ID reuse policy to the last execute_workflow call in the test.
resolutionDetails: Issue not reproduced after Temporal Core upgrade; closed pending reoccurrence.
keyQuote: sticky worker unavailable, please use original task queue.
